name: Calvin Pfrender
role: Software Developer Apprentice at SIX Group AG
bio: Swiss software developer apprentice focused on clarity, reliability, and best practices while building internal web apps and automations.

experience.focus: Building and maintaining various internal web applications and automations, taking ownership of both development and ongoing improvements. Gaining experience in agile teamwork, cloud technologies, DevOps practices, and AI integrations while contributing to different teams and internal initiatives.
Completing vocational education in software engineering EFZ.
